## Documentation Issue

### Location
Which documentation file or section has the issue?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] ARCHITECTURE.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] API documentation
- [ ] Code comments/docstrings
- [ ] Other: ___

### Type
- [ ] Typo or grammatical error
- [ ] Outdated information
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Other: ___

### Description
Describe the issue or improvement suggestion.

### Suggested Fix
If you have a suggestion for how to fix or improve the documentation, please describe it here.
